item.title: Three.js on Github
item.description: Everything officially related to the three.js project is in one rather monolithic repository on Github. Its maintained by the original creator of three.js, @mrdoob (AKA Ricardo Cabello), along with an army of open-source aficionados. It’s a huge and very active repo - the 16th most starred Javascript library on Github in fact, and the 8th most forked. Its up there with superstars like React, jQuery and Node.js. It’s also quite overwhelming at first glance, but luckily we only need to look inside two folders for now.
